title: US State Names
alt: Technically DC isn't a state, but no one is too pedantic about it because they don't want to disturb the snakes.
transcript:
[A political map of the United States is shown. The title reads:]
Geography challenge:
Name all 50 states[The state names in red text color are:]
Alabama => Bandana
Alaska => Alberta
Arizona => Verizona
Arkansas => Arkanoids
